abstract: AMR‘s American Airlines, British Airways and Iberia are gearing up to apply for antitrust immunity in order to form a joint venture that could create a trans-Atlantic aviation giant, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: AMR‘s American Airlines, British Airways and Iberia are gearing up to apply for antitrust immunity in order to form a joint venture that could create a trans-Atlantic aviation giant, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: American, B.A., Iberia Said to Explore Joint Venture
